Welcome. We're looking forward to 'dying' with you!

Participating in the die-in will be quick and easy. We estimate it will take around half an hour in total.

All you have to do is turn up and your chosen location before 12:30 on May 12, 2021.

At 12:30 we'll all lie down for 5 minutes while photos are are taken

Please visit our locations page to find out the location closest to you.

Then we'd really appreciate it if you could us the contact coordinator link to let the site coordinator know you'll be coming.

If there isn't a site close to you please consider coordinating a site in your town. There's more information on our 'Add a Site' page.

Other things you can do to help include:

  • Make a headstone for your death
  • Create a poster
  • Invite your friends and family
  • Share the event on your social media
